page.title: 14Clubs and Groups in Chilton
page.content: BADMINTON CLUB-held at school for parents;CHILTON AND HARWELL SOCIETY- joint parish group;CHILTON C.P.SCHOOL PARENT TEACHER ASSOCIATION-fund raises, organises social events;CHURCH GROUPS- discussion, bible study, prayer; CUB SCOUTS- for boys aged 8-11; DANCING CLASS-for primary school children; EVERGREENS-for senior citizens; GIRLS' BRIGADE-for girls aged 4 years to adult GUN CLUB-clay pigeon shooting; KARATE CLUB-children and adults; PARISH COUNCIL-elected by parishioners; PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL- elected by church members;PLAYGROUP-for children aged 2.5 to 5;SUNDAY SCHOOL-during church services;TODDLERS GROUP,CLINIC- mothers,toddlers;VILLAGE HALL MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE;WIVES GROUP-church group;WOMEN'S INSTITUTE-demonstrations, talks;YOUTH CLUB-social activities for children aged 10 to 15.
